channel.title: My mouse cursor keeps flickering with I have my server on?
channel.description:
Hi everytime I put my server on, the mouse flickers every like 10 seconds, but it doesn't when I have it off, it didn't used to do this, so does anyone no what I need to do?
Many Thanks Musicmad441[br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2007, 10:31:56 AM[/size][hr]please, I cant stop it.
